wiki.content:
Dave Clark and B.B. King joined forces to create this blues masterpiece originally from the "Indianola Mississippi Seeds" lp in the late sixties/early seventies. B.B. shows strong
 vocal prowress while simultaneously giving Lucille an extensive workout. The storyline speaks
 for itself. This is among King's best work.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary:
Dave Clark and B.B. King joined forces to create this blues masterpiece originally from the "Indianola Mississippi Seeds" lp in the late sixties/early seventies. B.B. shows strong
 vocal prowress while simultaneously giving Lucille an extensive workout. The storyline speaks
 for itself. This is among King's best work.

track.name: Chains And Things
comments: THE REAL BLUES!! THE SONG HAS SUCH MEANING TO ME

Finde ,das Reagge, eine weiterentwicklung darstellte!! Positive Vibrations, mit denen man die Welt besser gestalten kann. ich arbeite weiter daran und will nun pennen!!ich arbeite an gemeinsmen Zielen und einer freien Welt, in der man per ICE schiff überall hinfahren kann, wo man will dazu, brauche ich aber dringend einen guten Ing.
brilliant and insightful. full of passion and soul.
Describes perfectly how i feel now *repeats song*
He's not named King by mistake...he rules the blues!   Love the keys and the strings, who knew they'd add so much to a guitar blues?
hey... esta es mi musica....me gusta oirla .y..ademas interpetarla com .comigo?y con todos...esos som0s...todoooossss...toqmossss..
es una gran cancion  , yo siento el blues!!
